content:
Not entirely sure if this is a tech or discord question.  
In adding 2FA I had a glitch with my pw manager and have lost my discord pw and I can't change the pw without the current.  
I tried logging in from my phone (on a Mac here) and the Authy app seemed to get me in, but not on any channels.  Team H-W shows up, but says I'm in a weird space with no channel access.  
1) How do I get back on channels?
2) How do I change my pw without a current one?
Hi <@1266900496770400339> oh dear! I am looking for a solution. Can you try this https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/115001221072-Lost-Two-Factor-Codes
My 2FA seems to be working, it's my pw that's lost to the ether gods.

Oh wait...  my channels are back.  Yay. 
You can close and lock this thread, which I still haven't figured out.
